item.title: Subscribe to Grabz for exclusive insider privileges
item.description:
Source: Grabz website. Grabz is a subscription service that provides its members with exclusive benefits and special offers. Using location-based alerts and a wide range of affiliated businesses, the app connects its subscribers with exclusive deals and privileges in their city. For a monthly fee of S$15.98, premium members enjoy invitations to events and promotions such as discounted business class airfare and exclusive access to limited-edition luxury watches. Premium members also get access to the Grabz Concierge, a personalized booking service that assists members with securing reservations at clubs and getting on guest lists for exclusive parties in Singapore...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/subscribe-to-grabz-for-exclusive-insider-privileges/
